Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Interface GUIController

All Known Subinterfaces:
LobbyController
All Known Implementing Classes:
AssistantCardController, CharacterCardController, ChooseColorController, ChooseGameController, ChooseWizardController, CloudController, GameController, IslandController, IslandsController, NormalLobbyController, PlayerController, SchoolBoardController, StartScreenController, TeamLobbyController, WaitingViewController, WinnerScreenController
public interface GUIController
This class is a controller of the GUI.
